page.title: 11Droitwich - Leisure
page.content: The Lido bathing pool and Lido Park is an area to enjoy. It contains two swimming pools, one indoor and one out door, a playing area,small golf course, tennis courts and bowling greens. St. Peter's Field is another playing area close to the Lido Park. This area provides facilities for hockey, cricket and tennis. In Droitwich, there is also a range of churches. Sacred Heart and St.Catherine's are a form of Roman Courts of Justice. Sacred Heart's glory is its mosaics. They are made up of 8 tons of coloured Venetian glass called 'Tessacre'. Seven panels on the northern side are of St. Richard de Wych. St. Peter's is another picturesque church with a lych gate and 14th century tower. Dodderhill is also a church with a tower.
